statements.__comment: Create HAS_LAUNCH_CONFIG relationship from autoscale group to launch config
statements.query:
MATCH (aa:AWSAccount)-[:RESOURCE]->(a:AutoScalingGroup)
WITH a, aa
MATCH (aa)-[:RESOURCE]->(lc:LaunchConfiguration{name: a.launchconfigurationname})
MERGE (a)-[:HAS_LAUNCH_CONFIG]->(lc)
